website_summaries.verdict: This spacious drafting table is durable, easy to adjust and move, and has room for multiple drafting tools – all for a reasonable price.
pros: Offers ample easy-to-reach space for supplies because it has side trays, a wide pencil ridge, and 3 bottom drawers
Metal frame has a solid feel
Casters make it very easy to move from place to place
cons: Although the drawers are roomy, the plastic material they are made of is thin and could crack if not handled with care

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with one minor problem
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well built. Easy to assemble plus Allen wrench is included. The middle drawer of the 3 level drawer unit is cracked. I taped it so I could complete the setup process, but I would really appreciate a NEW middle drawer. This simple request has NOT yet been resolved or even addressed, for that matter. VERY satisfied with the product quality and value. Just wish somebody would answer my notes to the Seller about the replacement drawer. Would DEFINITELY buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SJL-Instructor

customer_reviews.title: Shaky on carpet, but good looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for our teen daughters. We put the first one together and discovered it shakes a lot (we do have carpet in their bedrooms). We replaced the casters with the feet provided and it fixed %50 of the issue. We'll give it a week to see if it settles before deciding if they both go back. it may be good enough for a hobby, but not for college level and certainly not professional. I wish I had waited because I paid full price too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with back problems
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was having trouble sitting at a regular table for long hours. Working at a tilt is the best way to get realistic effects. This table is worth every penny. The quality is sturdy. Great position. Easy to put together (thanks dad!) but this can be adjusted to a normal desk chair as well as a stool I am using it with my herman miller and the combination is perfect. Everything on the table is adjustable. Compartments are perfect sizes unless your picasso or super savvy artist, I have not yet met any of those requirements but I am definitely a beginner. This is great for those long hours. Buy the lamp that is recommended too.

We did have one cracked tray (as others have had), but the damage was not bad enough to contact the seller/manufacturer for replacement. I little glue will fix it. Overall, the desk is sturdy and nice looking. The tilt surface is a plus and our daughter seems to be enjoying it very much. 4 stars due to a couple instructional errors.
